_comment: Material-specific specification actions. Each material has up to 3 targeted actions for specifiers. Evidence prompts should vary (EPD / CoC / VOC / take-back / test data / provenance) to avoid repetition.

steel-frame: Provide an EPD (EN 15804) or verified embodied carbon figure (A1–A3), and confirm system boundary.
